mapper.select: select ( case degree when 1 then "初中" when 2 then "高中" when 3 then "大专" when 4 then "本科" when 5 then "硕士" when 6 then "博士") deg count(*) total from student group by degree order by total
select s.clazzName count(*) total from student s inner join clazz c on s.clazzName = c.name group by s.clazzName order by total
